codexWelcomeModal.title: Unlock Consistent Translations with the Codex
codexWelcomeModal.description: The Codex acts as a glossary for your project. By creating entries for characters, locations, and key terms, you provide the AI with essential context. This ensures names and lore are translated consistently every time, dramatically improving the quality of your translation.

system.base:
You are an expert prose editor.

Whenever you're given text, rephrase it using the following instructions: <instructions>{instructions}</instructions>

{tenseBlock}
Imitiate and keep the current writing style, and leave mannerisms, word choice and sentence structure intact.
You are free to remove redundant lines of speech. Use {language} spelling and grammar.

Only return the rephrased text, nothing else.
